textBeforeTable: ARH 135: Introduction to the History of Asian Art-Islamic, Buddhist, and Hindu Cultures (fulfills Distribution Area IV) Art History courses (ARH) For up-to-date enrollment information, see the Schedule of Classes from the Lehman Registrar's Office. Please consult the chair if you are interested in taking a senior project (ART 480) or an independent study (ART 486).
